resources.string: This app was hand made in Melbourne by Chris Horner.
It is not a product of, or affiliated with The New York Times.
It does not let you play Connections - only plan your answers.
All code is open source, and can be found here on GitHub.
Looks like something went wrong with your internet connection.
Looks like something went wrong with The New York Times\' servers. Are they down right now? Check the official app.
The New York Times\' server returned something strange. Maybe today\'s game is weird? Check the official app.
